footer.p: The [b]History[/b] tab shows the history of the current document. Using the context menu you can undo/redo actions here.
The current location in the stack will be prefixed with [b]>>[/b].

Would you like to know more? [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.Properties.xml]Properties[/url], [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.Permutations.xml]Permutations[/url], and [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.DataGrid.xml]DataGrid[/url]

section.name: EditItems
section.p: Edits to nodes appear with [color=Yellow]yellow pencil[/color] icons.

section.name: RemovedItems
section.p: Deletions and removal of nodes/connections appear with a [color=Red]red trashcan[/color].

section.name: NewItems
section.p: Actions for the creation of new nodes and connections have a [color=LimeGreen]green plus[/color] icon.
